Hello blank fragment swipe Tab 1 Tab 2 //////////////////////prevention cards///////// //mask "Wear Mask" "Wear a mask in public places.
Avoid touching face,nose and mouth." //hand wash "Wash Hands" "Clean your hands often.
Use soap and water, or an alcohol-based hand sanitizer." //social distancing "Social Distancing" "Maintain at least 1 metre (3 feet) distance between yourself and others." //cover while sneezing "Cover while sneezing" "Cover your nose and mouth with your bent elbow or a tissue when you cough or sneeze." //Stay at home "Stay at home" "Stay at home.
Avoid going to crowded places.
Self-isolate yourself even with minor symptoms."
